item.title: Install debian
item.description: Make Debian bootable USB using linux Download Debian installer Connect the USB flash drive and identify its device path. In this example, it’s /dev/sda (determine the correct device by its size) ❯ lsblk NAME MAJ:MIN RM SIZE RO TYPE MOUNTPOINTS sda 8:0 1 7.2G 0 disk ├─sda1 8:1 1 7.2G 0 part /media/kurotych/CCCOMA_X64FRE_EN-GB_DV9 └─sda2 8:2 1 1M 0 part /media/kurotych/UEFI_NTFS nvme1n1 259:0 0 931.5G 0 disk ├─nvme1n1p1 259:2 0 16M 0 part ├─nvme1n1p2 259:3 0 513M 0 part /boot/efi └─nvme1n1p3 259:4 0 931G 0 part / nvme0n1 259:1 0 931.
